ransack.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to go through a place, stealing things and causing damage
ransack.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The whole flat had been ransacked.
ransack.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to search a place very thoroughly, often making it untidy
ransack.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She ransacked the wardrobe for something to wear.
